channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Police remain on scene at burned out Michigan church after shooting and fire leave 4 dead, 8 wounded
item.description: Police officers walked amid the burned-out ruins of a Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints church in Michigan a day after a former Marine opened fire during a crowded service, killing at least four people and setting the building ablaze.
